page.title: 10My Village, Fivehead
page.content: The year is 1985. My name is Stuart Neil McHardy and I am 9 years old. I live in the village of Fivehead in Somerset. I live with my mum and my dad and my brother aged 11. We live in a detached house. We have a garden and a field, altogether we own two acres of land. In the village there is one shop which is also the Post Office. There is a playing field with swings, a climbing frame and a slide. Thee is also a tennis court. Once a year we have a 'Fun Day' when all the village play games and dress up in Fancy Dress. First of all there is a procession. The band is in front then there are majorettes and then there is the Fancy Dress Parade. There are some Show Tents and an 'It's a Knockout' competition. At 8.00 pm there is a Barn Dance which finishes at midnight. I like it in Fivehead.
